text: I just noticed today that we can't mass copy templates from one portal to another? Is this intended? It looks like we can multi-select templates within a folder to copy, but if we try to copy the parent folder or a folder with subfolders and templates that the copy option is greyed out. Is this intentional? Looks like we would have to copy each group of templates manually rather than being able to copy the whole thing like we could in DMv1. And this is *not* for purchased templates, but rather a set of templates that we custom built.
Could try using FTP to copy and paste though ID’s and whatnot might get screwy

Yeah, would prefer to just use the UI since it use to be easy. Here's a screenshot for reference. There are templates within each of the folders. My main issue is that you use to be able to copy an entire folder but now you can't.

You can, you just can’t copy folders, you have to select each template individually. I suggest opening up the folders, holding shift and selecting all, and then holding command and unselecting the folders.
